\xa0Access\xa0to\xa0clean\xa0water\xa0and\xa0health\xa0services\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0key\xa0complementary\xa0and\xa0synergetic\xa0health\xa0and\xa0 and\xa0medical\xa0outreach.\xa0To\xa0complement\xa0the\xa0efforts\xa0on\xa0improving\xa0health\xa0services\xa0provision,\xa0WBG\x92s\xa0interventions\xa0aimed\xa0at\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0supply\xa0and\xa0 sanitation\xa0services\xa0will\xa0improve\xa0living\xa0conditions,\xa0reduce\xa0public\xa0expenses\xa0for\xa0water?borne\xa0diseases\xa0and\xa0increase\xa0income?generation\xa0activities,\xa0particularly\xa0 for\xa0women.\xa0Addressing\xa0the\xa0urgent\xa0needs\xa0in\xa0a\xa0financially\xa0sustainable\xa0way\xa0will\xa0also\xa0provide\xa0the\xa0foundation\xa0for\xa0implementing\xa0sector\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0will\xa0support\xa0 further\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0and\xa0sanitation\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0focus\xa0its\xa0support\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0the\xa0access\xa0to\xa0essential\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0water\xa0 services\xa0across\xa0all\xa0segments\xa0of\xa0the\xa0population\xa0would\xa0have\xa0strong\xa0impact\xa0on\xa0inclusive\xa0growth\xa0and\xa0human\xa0capital\xa0development.\xa0This\xa0responds\xa0to\xa0the\xa0analysis\xa0 "\xa0Improve\xa0the\xa0delivery\xa0of\xa0quality\xa0\xa0Health\xa0and\xa0water\xa0services. \xa0Access\xa0to\xa0clean\xa0water\xa0and\xa0Health\xa0services\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0key\xa0complementary\xa0and\xa0synergetic\xa0Health\xa0and\xa0 nutrition\xa0determinants.\xa0\xa0Given\xa0its\xa0income\xa0level,\xa0Health\xa0indicators\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0are\xa0among\xa0the\xa0weakest\xa0in\xa0the\xa0region.\xa0The\xa0key\xa0binding\xa0constraints\xa0to\xa0Health\xa0 service\xa0utilization\xa0are\xa0access,\xa0affordability,\xa0availability,\xa0and\xa0acceptability.\xa0The\xa0WBG\xa0program\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0support\xa0Government\x92s\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0its\xa0Health\xa0 policy,\xa0which\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0the\xa0use\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0Health\xa0services,\xa0improve\xa0maternal,\xa0and\xa0child\xa0Health\xa0services;\xa0and\xa0reinforce\xa0prevention,\xa0Health\xa0promotion\xa0 and\xa0medical\xa0outreach.\xa0To\xa0complement\xa0the\xa0efforts\xa0on\xa0improving\xa0Health\xa0services\xa0provision,\xa0WBG\x92s\xa0interventions\xa0aimed\xa0at\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0supply\xa0and\xa0 sanitation\xa0services\xa0will\xa0improve\xa0living\xa0conditions,\xa0reduce\xa0public\xa0expenses\xa0for\xa0water?borne\xa0diseases\xa0and\xa0increase\xa0income?generation\xa0activities,\xa0particularly\xa0 for\xa0women.\xa0Addressing\xa0the\xa0urgent\xa0needs\xa0in\xa0a\xa0financially\xa0sustainable\xa0way\xa0will\xa0also\xa0provide\xa0the\xa0foundation\xa0for\xa0implementing\xa0sector\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0will\xa0support\xa0 further\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0and\xa0sanitation\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0focus\xa0its\xa0support\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0the\xa0access\xa0to\xa0essential\xa0Health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0water\xa0 services,\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0the\xa0level\xa0of\xa0financial\xa0Health\xa0protection\xa0for\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0groups.\xa0Enhanced\xa0access\xa0to\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0affordable\xa0Health\xa0care\xa0and\xa0nutrition\xa0 services\xa0across\xa0all\xa0segments\xa0of\xa0the\xa0population\xa0would\xa0have\xa0strong\xa0impact\xa0on\xa0inclusive\xa0growth\xa0and\xa0human\xa0capital\xa0development.\xa0This\xa0responds\xa0to\xa0the\xa0analysis\xa0 in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0which\xa0pointed\xa0out\xa0that\xa0access\xa0to\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0Health\xa0care\xa0will\xa0require\xa0considerable\xa0changes\xa0in\xa0resource\xa0allocation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0sector,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as institutional\xa0reforms\xa0and\xa0strengthening\xa0governance\xa0and\xa0accountability\xa0of\xa0the\xa0Health\xa0system,\xa0and\xa0that\xa0better\xa0access\xa0to\xa0drinking\xa0water\xa0is\xa0of\xa0particular\xa0 importance\xa0in\xa0the\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0Health\xa0care.\xa0Coordination\xa0with\xa0the\xa0number\xa0of\xa0donors\xa0active\xa0in\xa0the\xa0Health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0population\xa0areas\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0will\xa0 be\xa0essential,\xa0including\xa0AFD,\xa0EU\xa0UNFPA;\xa0Global\xa0Fund\xa0for\xa0malaria;\xa0USAID;\xa0and\xa0UNICEF.\xa0\xa0 . Number\xa0of\xa0people\xa0with\xa0access\xa0to\xa0a\xa0basic\xa0 package\xa0of\xa0Health,\xa0nutrition\xa0or\xa0reproductive\xa0 Health\xa0services\xa0(Gender\xa0disaggregated)\xa0 Baseline:\xa0\xa00\xa0(2014)\xa0 Target:\xa0\xa07.5\xa0million\xa0(cumulative)\xa0(2019)\xa0\xa0 \xa0 Government\xa0spending\xa0on\xa0social\xa0sectors*\xa0 (including\xa0Health)\xa0targeted\xa0to\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0\xa0 Baseline:\xa08.6%\xa0GDP\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa012%\xa0GDP\xa0(2019)\xa0 *See\xa0definition\xa0note\xa0in\xa0Annex\xa02 Access\xa0to\xa0improved\xa0water\xa0source\xa0(%\xa0of\xa0national\xa0 urban\xa0population)\xa0\xa0 Baseline:\xa070%\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa075%\xa0(2019)\xa0" )

and\xa0medical\xa0outreach.\xa0To\xa0complement\xa0the\xa0efforts\xa0on\xa0improving\xa0health\xa0services\xa0provision,\xa0WBG\x92s\xa0interventions\xa0aimed\xa0at\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0supply\xa0and\xa0 sanitation\xa0services\xa0will\xa0improve\xa0living\xa0conditions,\xa0reduce\xa0public\xa0expenses\xa0for\xa0water?borne\xa0diseases\xa0and\xa0increase\xa0income?generation\xa0activities,\xa0particularly\xa0 for\xa0women.\xa0Addressing\xa0the\xa0urgent\xa0needs\xa0in\xa0a\xa0financially\xa0sustainable\xa0way\xa0will\xa0also\xa0provide\xa0the\xa0foundation\xa0for\xa0implementing\xa0sector\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0will\xa0support\xa0 further\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0and\xa0sanitation\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0focus\xa0its\xa0support\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0the\xa0access\xa0to\xa0essential\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0water\xa0 services,\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0the\xa0level\xa0of\xa0financial\xa0health\xa0protection\xa0for\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0groups.\xa0Enhanced\xa0access\xa0to\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0affordable\xa0health\xa0care\xa0and\xa0nutrition\xa0 services\xa0across\xa0all\xa0segments\xa0of\xa0the\xa0population\xa0would\xa0have\xa0strong\xa0impact\xa0on\xa0inclusive\xa0growth\xa0and\xa0human\xa0capital\xa0development.\xa0This\xa0responds\xa0to\xa0the\xa0analysis\xa0 in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0which\xa0pointed\xa0out\xa0that\xa0access\xa0to\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0care\xa0will\xa0require\xa0considerable\xa0changes\xa0in\xa0resource\xa0allocation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0sector,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as institutional\xa0reforms\xa0and\xa0strengthening\xa0governance\xa0and\xa0accountability\xa0of\xa0the\xa0health\xa0system,\xa0and\xa0that\xa0better\xa0access\xa0to\xa0drinking\xa0water\xa0is\xa0of\xa0particular\xa0 importance\xa0in\xa0the\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0care.\xa0Coordination\xa0with\xa0the\xa0number\xa0of\xa0donors\xa0active\xa0in\xa0the\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0population\xa0areas\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0will\xa0 be\xa0essential,\xa0including\xa0AFD,\xa0EU\xa0UNFPA;\xa0Global\xa0Fund\xa0for\xa0malaria;\xa0USAID;\xa0and\xa0UNICEF.\xa0\xa0 . Because\xa0of\xa0lack\xa0of\xa0social\xa0protection\xa0measures,\xa0as\xa0shown\xa0in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0the\xa0welfare\xa0among\xa0poorer\xa0households\xa0has\xa0been\xa0more\xa0negatively\xa0 affected\xa0by\xa0recent\xa0shocks\xa0than\xa0that\xa0of\xa0the\xa0general\xa0population.\xa0The\xa0bottom\xa0decile\xa0has\xa0experienced\xa0the\xa0greatest\xa0losses\xa0to\xa0consumption.\xa0Therefore,\xa0building\xa0 a\xa0social\xa0protection\xa0system\xa0can\xa0help\xa0lay\xa0the\xa0foundations\xa0for\xa0channeling\xa0much?needed\xa0resources\xa0to\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0households.\xa0Social\xa0Protection\xa0measures\xa0have\xa0 proven\xa0effective\xa0in\xa0mitigating\xa0the\xa0impacts\xa0of\xa0shocks,\xa0protecting\xa0households\x92\xa0assets,\xa0supporting\xa0graduation\xa0out\xa0of\xa0poverty\xa0and\xa0preventing\xa0inter?generational\xa0 transmission\xa0of\xa0poverty.\xa0The\xa0Government\xa0emphasizes\xa0social\xa0protection\xa0as\xa0non?contributory\xa0safety\xa0nets\xa0are\xa0still\xa0in\xa0their\xa0infancy,\xa0and\xa0contributory\xa0social\xa0 security\xa0covers\xa0a\xa0small\xa0proportion\xa0of\xa0the\xa0population\xa0in\xa0formal\xa0jobs.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0the\xa0Government\xa0in\xa0establishing\xa0the\xa0foundation\xa0of\xa0a\xa0national\xa0social\xa0 protection\xa0system\xa0and\xa0to\xa0provide\xa0cash\xa0transfers\xa0to\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0households\xa0in\xa0the\xa0most\xa0vulnerable\xa0regions\xa0with\xa0a\xa0view\xa0to\xa0increasing\xa0household\xa0consumption\xa0 and\xa0addressing\xa0demand?side\xa0financial\xa0barriers\xa0to\xa0social\xa0services.\xa0Working\xa0with\xa0UNICEF,\xa0WFP\xa0and\xa0selected\xa0NGOs,\xa0the\xa0World\xa0Bank\xa0Group\xa0support\xa0will\xa0play\xa0a\xa0 key\xa0role\xa0in\xa0addressing\xa0the\xa0gap\xa0in\xa0longer?term\xa0and\xa0institutional\xa0systems\xa0for\xa0social\xa0protection\xa0and\xa0safety\xa0nets.\xa0\xa0 . \xa0Access\xa0to\xa0clean\xa0water\xa0and\xa0health\xa0services\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0key\xa0complementary\xa0and\xa0synergetic\xa0health\xa0and\xa0 nutrition\xa0determinants.\xa0\xa0Given\xa0its\xa0income\xa0level,\xa0health\xa0indicators\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0are\xa0among\xa0the\xa0weakest\xa0in\xa0the\xa0region.\xa0The\xa0key\xa0binding\xa0constraints\xa0to\xa0health\xa0 service\xa0utilization\xa0are\xa0access,\xa0affordability,\xa0availability,\xa0and\xa0acceptability.\xa0The\xa0WBG\xa0program\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0support\xa0Government\x92s\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0its\xa0health\xa0 policy,\xa0which\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0the\xa0use\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0services,\xa0improve\xa0maternal,\xa0and\xa0child\xa0health\xa0services;\xa0and\xa0reinforce\xa0prevention,\xa0health\xa0promotion\xa0 sanitation\xa0services\xa0will\xa0improve\xa0living\xa0conditions,\xa0reduce\xa0public\xa0expenses\xa0for\xa0water?borne\xa0diseases\xa0and\xa0increase\xa0income?generation\xa0activities,\xa0particularly\xa0 policy,\xa0which\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0the\xa0use\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0services,\xa0improve\xa0maternal,\xa0and\xa0child\xa0health\xa0services;\xa0and\xa0reinforce\xa0prevention,\xa0health\xa0promotion\xa0 and\xa0medical\xa0outreach.\xa0To\xa0complement\xa0the\xa0efforts\xa0on\xa0improving\xa0health\xa0services\xa0provision,\xa0WBG\x92s\xa0interventions\xa0aimed\xa0at\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0supply\xa0and\xa0 sanitation\xa0services\xa0will\xa0improve\xa0living\xa0conditions,\xa0reduce\xa0public\xa0expenses\xa0for\xa0water?borne\xa0diseases\xa0and\xa0increase\xa0income?generation\xa0activities,\xa0particularly\xa0 for\xa0women.\xa0Addressing\xa0the\xa0urgent\xa0needs\xa0in\xa0a\xa0financially\xa0sustainable\xa0way\xa0will\xa0also\xa0provide\xa0the\xa0foundation\xa0for\xa0implementing\xa0sector\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0will\xa0support\xa0 further\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0and\xa0sanitation\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0focus\xa0its\xa0support\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0the\xa0access\xa0to\xa0essential\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0water\xa0 services,\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0the\xa0level\xa0of\xa0financial\xa0health\xa0protection\xa0for\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0groups.\xa0Enhanced\xa0access\xa0to\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0affordable\xa0health\xa0care\xa0and\xa0nutrition\xa0 services\xa0across\xa0all\xa0segments\xa0of\xa0the\xa0population\xa0would\xa0have\xa0strong\xa0impact\xa0on\xa0inclusive\xa0Growth\xa0and\xa0Human\xa0Capital\xa0development.\xa0This\xa0responds\xa0to\xa0the\xa0analysis\xa0 in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0which\xa0pointed\xa0out\xa0that\xa0access\xa0to\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0care\xa0will\xa0require\xa0considerable\xa0changes\xa0in\xa0resource\xa0allocation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0sector,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as institutional\xa0reforms\xa0and\xa0strengthening\xa0governance\xa0and\xa0accountability\xa0of\xa0the\xa0health\xa0system,\xa0and\xa0that\xa0better\xa0access\xa0to\xa0drinking\xa0water\xa0is\xa0of\xa0particular\xa0 importance\xa0in\xa0the\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0care.\xa0Coordination\xa0with\xa0the\xa0number\xa0of\xa0donors\xa0active\xa0in\xa0the\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0population\xa0areas\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0will\xa0 be\xa0essential,\xa0including\xa0AFD,\xa0EU\xa0UNFPA;\xa0Global\xa0Fund\xa0for\xa0malaria;\xa0USAID;\xa0and\xa0UNICEF.\xa0\xa0 . Number\xa0of\xa0people\xa0with\xa0access\xa0to\xa0a\xa0basic\xa0 package\xa0of\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0or\xa0reproductive\xa0 health\xa0services\xa0(gender\xa0disaggregated)\xa0 Baseline:\xa0\xa00\xa0(2014)\xa0 Target:\xa0\xa07.5\xa0million\xa0(cumulative)\xa0(2019)\xa0\xa0 \xa0 Government\xa0spending\xa0on\xa0social\xa0sectors*\xa0 (including\xa0health)\xa0targeted\xa0to\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0\xa0 Baseline:\xa08.6%\xa0GDP\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa012%\xa0GDP\xa0(2019)\xa0 *See\xa0definition\xa0note\xa0in\xa0Annex\xa02\nAccess\xa0to\xa0improved\xa0water\xa0source\xa0(%\xa0of\xa0national\xa0 urban\xa0population)\xa0\xa0 Baseline:\xa070%\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa075%\xa0(2019)\xa0" )

"\xa0Improve\xa0education\xa0service\xa0delivery\xa0and\xa0youth\xa0employability . Improvements\xa0in\xa0basic\xa0education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0critical\xa0complimentary\xa0inputs\xa0 aimed\xa0at\xa0ensuring\xa0better\xa0access\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0to\xa0more\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0opportunities.\xa0Education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0also\xa0critical\xa0for\xa0the\xa0 economic\xa0transformation\xa0sought\xa0by\xa0the\xa0Government,\xa0and\xa0for\xa0ensuring\xa0that\xa0benefits\xa0from\xa0growth\xa0reach\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0and\xa0are\xa0equitably\xa0shared.\xa0As\xa0pointed\xa0 out\xa0in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0education\xa0system,\xa0including\xa0technical\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training,\xa0has\xa0suffered\xa0from\xa0weak\xa0governance,\xa0lack\xa0of\xa0a\xa0clearly\xa0defined\xa0 mission,\xa0and\xa0poor\xa0linkages\xa0with\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0stakeholders\xa0and\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs.\xa0Improving\xa0youth\xa0employability\xa0will\xa0require\xa0close\xa0collaboration\xa0between\xa0 institutions\xa0in\xa0charge\xa0of\xa0skill\xa0development,\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0policies,\xa0financial\xa0institutions,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0to\xa0address\xa0the\xa0multiple\xa0constraints\xa0to\xa0higher\xa0 productivity\xa0in\xa0key\xa0economic\xa0sectors.\xa0The\xa0Government\x92s\xa0employment\xa0policy\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0encourage\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0by\xa0supporting\xa0specialized\xa0 training,\xa0calls\xa0for\xa0universal\xa0primary\xa0education,\xa0youth\xa0training\xa0consistent\xa0with\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs;\xa0and\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0vocational\xa0training\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0labor\xa0 productivity.\xa0Building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0successful\xa0Youth\xa0Employment\xa0Project,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0expand\xa0its\xa0support\xa0to\xa0address\xa0more\xa0systemic\xa0issues\xa0such\xa0as\xa0the\xa0mismatch\xa0 between\xa0the\xa0training\xa0provided\xa0by\xa0the\xa0education\xa0system\xa0and\xa0the\xa0country's\xa0needs,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0significant\xa0disparities\xa0across\xa0region,\xa0social?economic\xa0status,\xa0income\xa0 and\xa0gender\xa0in\xa0the\xa0education\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0improvement\xa0in\xa0the\xa0relevance,\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0performance\xa0of\xa0the\xa0education\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training\xa0 systems\xa0to\xa0ensure\xa0better\xa0insertion\xa0and\xa0integration\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0into\xa0the\xa0labor\xa0market.\xa0Promotion\xa0of\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0and\xa0increased\xa0earnings\xa0capabilities\xa0 should\xa0focus\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0productivity\xa0in\xa0self?employment\xa0and\xa0micro?enterprises\xa0where\xa0most\xa0of\xa0the\xa0poor\xa0work.\xa0In\xa0its\xa0support,\xa0the\xa0World\xa0Bank\xa0Group\xa0will\xa0 employment. "\xa0Improve\xa0education\xa0service\xa0delivery\xa0and\xa0youth\xa0employability . Improvements\xa0in\xa0basic\xa0education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0critical\xa0complimentary\xa0inputs\xa0 aimed\xa0at\xa0ensuring\xa0better\xa0access\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0to\xa0more\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0opportunities.\xa0Education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0also\xa0critical\xa0for\xa0the\xa0 economic\xa0transformation\xa0sought\xa0by\xa0the\xa0Government,\xa0and\xa0for\xa0ensuring\xa0that\xa0benefits\xa0from\xa0growth\xa0reach\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0and\xa0are\xa0equitably\xa0shared.\xa0As\xa0pointed\xa0 productivity\xa0in\xa0key\xa0economic\xa0sectors.\xa0The\xa0Government\x92s\xa0employment\xa0policy\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0encourage\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0by\xa0supporting\xa0specialized\xa0 productivity.\xa0Building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0successful\xa0Youth\xa0Employment\xa0Project,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0expand\xa0its\xa0support\xa0to\xa0address\xa0more\xa0systemic\xa0issues\xa0such\xa0as\xa0the\xa0mismatch\xa0 Formalizing\xa0and\xa0enhancing\xa0access\xa0to\xa0land\xa0for\xa0people\xa0and\xa0business\xa0is\xa0a\xa0priority\xa0and\xa0key\xa0to\xa0stability,\xa0reduction\xa0in\xa0fragility,and\xa0development. The\xa0Government\xa0considers\xa0land\xa0security\xa0a\xa0prerequisite\xa0for\xa0the\xa0modernization\xa0of\xa0the\xa0agriculture\xa0sector.\xa0Clear\xa0land\xa0rights\xa0and\xa0informed\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0are\xa0 an\xa0incentive\xa0for\xa0both\xa0smallholders\xa0and\xa0private\xa0investors\xa0and\xa0a\xa0key\xa0prerequisite\xa0for\xa0shared\xa0growth.\xa0Access\xa0to\xa0industrial\xa0land\xa0with\xa0adequate\xa0infrastructure\xa0is\xa0 in\xa0high\xa0demand\xa0from\xa0new\xa0investors.\xa0Improving\xa0the\xa0governance\xa0of\xa0urban\xa0land\xa0is\xa0especially\xa0important\xa0to\xa0the\xa0Ivorian\xa0urban\xa0population,\xa0which\xa0continues\xa0to\xa0 grow\xa0rapidly.\xa0Land\xa0rights\xa0formalization\xa0is\xa0crucial\xa0for\xa0the\xa0gradual\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0a\xa0documented\xa0land\xa0market\xa0that\xa0provides\xa0confidence\xa0to\xa0stakeholders\xa0 and\xa0facilitate\xa0solid\xa0business\xa0transactions.\xa0A\xa0transparent\xa0land\xa0market\xa0will\xa0be\xa0conducive\xa0to\xa0investment\xa0and\xa0increased\xa0productivity.\xa0Responding\xa0to\xa0the\xa0SCD\xa0 emphasis\xa0on\xa0the\xa0importance\xa0of\xa0land\xa0reform,\xa0the\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0improvement\xa0to\xa0the\xa0land\xa0management\xa0system\xa0through\xa0a\xa0Land\xa0Reform\xa0Implementation\xa0 Project,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as\xa0crosscutting\xa0engagement\xa0in\xa0other\xa0operations,\xa0focusing\xa0on\xa0sustainability\xa0of\xa0agricultural\xa0value\xa0chains\xa0in\xa0rural\xa0areas,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0completion\xa0of\xa0 the\xa0land\xa0policy\xa0design\xa0and\xa0land\xa0rights\xa0registration.\xa0Support\xa0will\xa0be\xa0coordinated\xa0through\xa0the\xa0thematic\xa0working\xa0group\xa0on\xa0rural\xa0land\xa0that\xa0is\xa0co?led\xa0by\xa0the\xa0EU\xa0 and\xa0the\xa0WB,\xa0and\xa0includes\xa0AfDB,\xa0AFD\xa0and\xa0FAO. Number\xa0of\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0and\xa0leases\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0100,000\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 Private\xa0investment\xa0catalyzed\xa0in\xa0industrial\xa0and\xa0 Special\xa0Economic\xa0Zones\xa0(as\xa0measured\xa0by\xa0 AGEDI\xa0and\xa0CEPICI))\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0US$50\xa0million\xa0(2019)\xa0\n", "\xa0Improve\xa0Education\xa0service\xa0delivery\xa0and\xa0youth\xa0employability . Improvements\xa0in\xa0basic\xa0Education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0Skills\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0critical\xa0complimentary\xa0inputs\xa0 aimed\xa0at\xa0ensuring\xa0better\xa0access\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0to\xa0more\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0opportunities.\xa0Education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0Skills\xa0are\xa0also\xa0critical\xa0for\xa0the\xa0 economic\xa0transformation\xa0sought\xa0by\xa0the\xa0Government,\xa0and\xa0for\xa0ensuring\xa0that\xa0benefits\xa0from\xa0growth\xa0reach\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0and\xa0are\xa0equitably\xa0shared.\xa0As\xa0pointed\xa0 out\xa0in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0Education\xa0system,\xa0including\xa0technical\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training,\xa0has\xa0suffered\xa0from\xa0weak\xa0governance,\xa0lack\xa0of\xa0a\xa0clearly\xa0defined\xa0 mission,\xa0and\xa0poor\xa0linkages\xa0with\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0stakeholders\xa0and\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs.\xa0Improving\xa0youth\xa0employability\xa0will\xa0require\xa0close\xa0collaboration\xa0between\xa0 "\xa0Improve\xa0the\xa0delivery\xa0of\xa0quality\xa0\xa0health\xa0and\xa0water\xa0services. \xa0Access\xa0to\xa0clean\xa0water\xa0and\xa0health\xa0services\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0key\xa0complementary\xa0and\xa0synergetic\xa0health\xa0and\xa0 services\xa0across\xa0all\xa0segments\xa0of\xa0the\xa0population\xa0would\xa0have\xa0strong\xa0impact\xa0on\xa0inclusive\xa0growth\xa0and\xa0human\xa0capital\xa0development.\xa0This\xa0responds\xa0to\xa0the\xa0analysis\xa0 be\xa0essential,\xa0including\xa0AFD,\xa0EU\xa0UNFPA;\xa0Global\xa0Fund\xa0for\xa0malaria;\xa0USAID;\xa0and\xa0UNICEF.\xa0\xa0 . "\xa0Improve\xa0the\xa0delivery\xa0of\xa0quality\xa0\xa0health\xa0and\xa0water\xa0services. and\xa0medical\xa0outreach.\xa0To\xa0complement\xa0the\xa0efforts\xa0on\xa0improving\xa0health\xa0services\xa0provision,\xa0WBG\x92s\xa0interventions\xa0aimed\xa0at\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0supply\xa0and\xa0 sanitation\xa0services\xa0will\xa0improve\xa0living\xa0conditions,\xa0reduce\xa0public\xa0expenses\xa0for\xa0water?borne\xa0diseases\xa0and\xa0increase\xa0income?generation\xa0activities,\xa0particularly\xa0 "\xa0Improve\xa0the\xa0delivery\xa0of\xa0quality\xa0\xa0health\xa0and\xa0water\xa0services. service\xa0utilization\xa0are\xa0access,\xa0affordability,\xa0availability,\xa0and\xa0acceptability.\xa0The\xa0WBG\xa0program\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0support\xa0Government\x92s\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0its\xa0health\xa0 and\xa0medical\xa0outreach.\xa0To\xa0complement\xa0the\xa0efforts\xa0on\xa0improving\xa0health\xa0services\xa0provision,\xa0WBG\x92s\xa0interventions\xa0aimed\xa0at\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0supply\xa0and\xa0 sanitation\xa0services\xa0will\xa0improve\xa0living\xa0conditions,\xa0reduce\xa0public\xa0expenses\xa0for\xa0water?borne\xa0diseases\xa0and\xa0increase\xa0income?generation\xa0activities,\xa0particularly\xa0 for\xa0women.\xa0Addressing\xa0the\xa0urgent\xa0needs\xa0in\xa0a\xa0financially\xa0sustainable\xa0way\xa0will\xa0also\xa0provide\xa0the\xa0foundation\xa0for\xa0implementing\xa0sector\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0will\xa0support\xa0 further\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0and\xa0sanitation\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0focus\xa0its\xa0support\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0the\xa0access\xa0to\xa0essential\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0water\xa0 services\xa0across\xa0all\xa0segments\xa0of\xa0the\xa0population\xa0would\xa0have\xa0strong\xa0impact\xa0on\xa0inclusive\xa0growth\xa0and\xa0human\xa0capital\xa0development.\xa0This\xa0responds\xa0to\xa0the\xa0analysis\xa0 in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0which\xa0pointed\xa0out\xa0that\xa0access\xa0to\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0care\xa0will\xa0require\xa0considerable\xa0changes\xa0in\xa0resource\xa0allocation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0sector,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as institutional\xa0reforms\xa0and\xa0strengthening\xa0governance\xa0and\xa0accountability\xa0of\xa0the\xa0health\xa0system,\xa0and\xa0that\xa0better\xa0access\xa0to\xa0drinking\xa0water\xa0is\xa0of\xa0particular\xa0 importance\xa0in\xa0the\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0care.\xa0Coordination\xa0with\xa0the\xa0number\xa0of\xa0donors\xa0active\xa0in\xa0the\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0population\xa0areas\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0will\xa0 be\xa0essential,\xa0including\xa0AFD,\xa0EU\xa0UNFPA;\xa0Global\xa0Fund\xa0for\xa0malaria;\xa0USAID;\xa0and\xa0UNICEF.\xa0\xa0 . \xa0Improvements\xa0in\xa0business\xa0environment\xa0and\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0complimentary\xa0and\xa0synergetic\xa0 prerequisites\xa0for\xa0sustainable\xa0private\xa0sector?led\xa0growth\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire,\xa0especially\xa0for\xa0SMEs.\xa0While\xa0building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0existing\xa0work\xa0of\xa0IFC\xa0to\xa0provide\xa0firms\xa0with\xa0 access\xa0to\xa0finance,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0enhance\xa0its\xa0support\xa0in\xa0response\xa0to\xa0the\xa0identified\xa0SCD\xa0priority\xa0to\xa0reduce\xa0the\xa0financial\xa0access\xa0gap.\xa0The\xa0Government\xa0has\xa0 articulated\xa0a\xa0private\xa0sector?led\xa0growth\xa0strategy\xa0fostering\xa0the\xa0Development\xa0of\xa0industry\xa0and\xa0SMEs\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance,\xa0including\xa0reforms\xa0to\xa0 improve\xa0the\xa0business\xa0environment,\xa0investment\xa0climate\xa0reform,\xa0and\xa0reforms\xa0in\xa0the\xa0governance\xa0of\xa0the\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0that\xa0will\xa0strengthen\xa0the\xa0capacity\xa0of\xa0 financial\xa0institutions\xa0to\xa0promote\xa0investment\xa0in\xa0agriculture,\xa0Agribusiness\xa0and\xa0manufacturing.\xa0The\xa0program\xa0will\xa0support\xa0growth\xa0opportunities,\xa0especially\xa0for\xa0 SMEs\xa0and\xa0micro?enterprises,\xa0by\xa0addressing\xa0improvements\xa0to\xa0adequate\xa0funding\xa0and\xa0to\xa0financial\xa0services\xa0in\xa0general,\xa0including\xa0banks\xa0and\xa0microcredit\xa0 networks.\xa0Coupled\xa0with\xa0an\xa0improved\xa0business\xa0environment,\xa0a\xa0stronger\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0would\xa0help\xa0spur\xa0entrepreneurship,\xa0MSME\xa0Development,\xa0investment\xa0 and\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0\x96\xa0thereby\xa0reducing\xa0poverty\xa0and\xa0promoting\xa0shared\xa0prosperity.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0would\xa0support\xa0regulatory\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0facilitate\xa0business\xa0and\xa0private\xa0 sector\xa0growth,\xa0and\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance\xa0for\xa0households\xa0and\xa0for\xa0housing,\xa0and\xa0MSME\xa0businesses\xa0through\xa0an\xa0intervention\xa0on\xa0Governance\xa0and\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0 Development.\xa0Coordination\xa0will\xa0be\xa0ensured\xa0through\xa0a\xa0set\xa0of\xa0donor\xa0committees\xa0on\xa0Industry/SME\xa0Development\xa0and\xa0Private\xa0sector\xa0Development/Business\xa0 climate\xa0that\xa0are\xa0led\xa0by\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0and\xa0include\xa0USAID,\xa0UNIDO,\xa0Canada,\xa0EU,\xa0AfDB,\xa0JICA,\xa0and\xa0AFD.\xa0\xa0 . Overall\xa0distance\xa0to\xa0frontier\xa0(DTF)\xa0score\xa0(0\x96 100)\xa0 Baseline:\xa052.26\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa060\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Number\xa0of\xa0MSME\xa0outstanding\xa0loans\xa0 Baseline:\xa00.8\xa0million\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa01.44\xa0million\xa0(2019)\xa0" )

children.name: Land Reform
children.para: FormalizeandenhanceaccesstoLandforbusinessandagriculture . FormalizingandenhancingaccesstoLandforpeopleandbusinessisapriorityandkeytostability,reductioninfragility,anddevelopment. TheGovernmentconsidersLandsecurityaprerequisiteforthemodernizationoftheagriculturesector.ClearLandrightsandinformedLandtransactionsare anincentiveforbothsmallholdersandprivateinvestorsandakeyprerequisiteforsharedgrowth.AccesstoindustrialLandwithadequateinfrastructureis inhighdemandfromnewinvestors.ImprovingthegovernanceofurbanLandisespeciallyimportanttotheIvorianurbanpopulation,whichcontinuesto growrapidly.LandrightsformalizationiscrucialforthegradualimplementationofadocumentedLandmarketthatprovidesconfidencetostakeholders andfacilitatesolidbusinesstransactions.AtransparentLandmarketwillbeconducivetoinvestmentandincreasedproductivity.RespondingtotheSCD emphasisontheimportanceofLandReform,theCPFwillsupportimprovementtotheLandmanagementsystemthroughaLandReformImplementation Project,aswellascrosscuttingengagementinotheroperations,focusingonsustainabilityofagriculturalvaluechainsinruralareas,andthecompletionof theLandpolicydesignandLandrightsregistration.SupportwillbecoordinatedthroughthethematicworkinggrouponruralLandthatisco?ledbytheEU andtheWB,andincludesAfDB,AFDandFAO. NumberofLandtransactionsandleases Baseline:0(2015) Target:100,000(2019) Privateinvestmentcatalyzedinindustrialand SpecialEconomicZones(asmeasuredby AGEDIandCEPICI)) Baseline:0(2015) Target:US$50million(2019)

Number\xa0of\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0and\xa0leases\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0100,000\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 Private\xa0investment\xa0catalyzed\xa0in\xa0industrial\xa0and\xa0 Special\xa0Economic\xa0Zones\xa0(as\xa0measured\xa0by\xa0 AGEDI\xa0and\xa0CEPICI))\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0US$50\xa0million\xa0(2019)\xa0\n", "\xa0\xa0Formalize\xa0and\xa0enhance\xa0access\xa0to\xa0land\xa0for\xa0businessand\xa0agriculture . Number\xa0of\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0and\xa0leases\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0100,000\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 Private\xa0investment\xa0catalyzed\xa0in\xa0industrial\xa0and\xa0 Special\xa0Economic\xa0Zones\xa0(as\xa0measured\xa0by\xa0 AGEDI\xa0and\xa0CEPICI))\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0US$50\xa0million\xa0(2019)\xa0\n", "\xa0Improve\xa0the\xa0delivery\xa0of\xa0quality\xa0\xa0health\xa0and\xa0water\xa0services. \xa0Access\xa0to\xa0clean\xa0water\xa0and\xa0health\xa0services\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0key\xa0complementary\xa0and\xa0synergetic\xa0health\xa0and\xa0 nutrition\xa0determinants.\xa0\xa0Given\xa0its\xa0income\xa0level,\xa0health\xa0indicators\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0are\xa0among\xa0the\xa0weakest\xa0in\xa0the\xa0region.\xa0The\xa0key\xa0binding\xa0constraints\xa0to\xa0health\xa0 service\xa0utilization\xa0are\xa0access,\xa0affordability,\xa0availability,\xa0and\xa0acceptability.\xa0The\xa0WBG\xa0program\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0support\xa0Government\x92s\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0its\xa0health\xa0 policy,\xa0which\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0the\xa0use\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0services,\xa0improve\xa0maternal,\xa0and\xa0child\xa0health\xa0services;\xa0and\xa0reinforce\xa0prevention,\xa0health\xa0promotion\xa0 and\xa0medical\xa0outreach.\xa0To\xa0complement\xa0the\xa0efforts\xa0on\xa0improving\xa0health\xa0services\xa0provision,\xa0WBG\x92s\xa0interventions\xa0aimed\xa0at\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0supply\xa0and\xa0 sanitation\xa0services\xa0will\xa0improve\xa0living\xa0conditions,\xa0reduce\xa0public\xa0expenses\xa0for\xa0water?borne\xa0diseases\xa0and\xa0increase\xa0income?generation\xa0activities,\xa0particularly\xa0 for\xa0women.\xa0Addressing\xa0the\xa0urgent\xa0needs\xa0in\xa0a\xa0financially\xa0sustainable\xa0way\xa0will\xa0also\xa0provide\xa0the\xa0foundation\xa0for\xa0implementing\xa0sector\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0will\xa0support\xa0 further\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0and\xa0sanitation\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0focus\xa0its\xa0support\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0the\xa0access\xa0to\xa0essential\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0water\xa0 services,\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0the\xa0level\xa0of\xa0financial\xa0health\xa0protection\xa0for\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0groups.\xa0Enhanced\xa0access\xa0to\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0affordable\xa0health\xa0care\xa0and\xa0nutrition\xa0 services\xa0across\xa0all\xa0segments\xa0of\xa0the\xa0population\xa0would\xa0have\xa0strong\xa0impact\xa0on\xa0inclusive\xa0growth\xa0and\xa0human\xa0capital\xa0Development.\xa0This\xa0responds\xa0to\xa0the\xa0analysis\xa0 in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0which\xa0pointed\xa0out\xa0that\xa0access\xa0to\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0care\xa0will\xa0require\xa0considerable\xa0changes\xa0in\xa0resource\xa0allocation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0sector,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as institutional\xa0reforms\xa0and\xa0strengthening\xa0governance\xa0and\xa0accountability\xa0of\xa0the\xa0health\xa0system,\xa0and\xa0that\xa0better\xa0access\xa0to\xa0drinking\xa0water\xa0is\xa0of\xa0particular\xa0 importance\xa0in\xa0the\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0health\xa0care.\xa0Coordination\xa0with\xa0the\xa0number\xa0of\xa0donors\xa0active\xa0in\xa0the\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0population\xa0areas\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0will\xa0 be\xa0essential,\xa0including\xa0AFD,\xa0EU\xa0UNFPA;\xa0Global\xa0Fund\xa0for\xa0malaria;\xa0USAID;\xa0and\xa0UNICEF.\xa0\xa0 . Number\xa0of\xa0people\xa0with\xa0access\xa0to\xa0a\xa0basic\xa0 package\xa0of\xa0health,\xa0nutrition\xa0or\xa0reproductive\xa0 health\xa0services\xa0(gender\xa0disaggregated)\xa0 Baseline:\xa0\xa00\xa0(2014)\xa0 Target:\xa0\xa07.5\xa0million\xa0(cumulative)\xa0(2019)\xa0\xa0 \xa0 Government\xa0spending\xa0on\xa0social\xa0sectors*\xa0 (including\xa0health)\xa0targeted\xa0to\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0\xa0 Baseline:\xa08.6%\xa0GDP\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa012%\xa0GDP\xa0(2019)\xa0 *See\xa0definition\xa0note\xa0in\xa0Annex\xa02\nAccess\xa0to\xa0improved\xa0water\xa0source\xa0(%\xa0of\xa0national\xa0 urban\xa0population)\xa0\xa0 Baseline:\xa070%\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa075%\xa0(2019)\xa0" )

services,\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0the\xa0level\xa0of\xa0financial\xa0health\xa0protection\xa0for\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0groups.\xa0Enhanced\xa0access\xa0to\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0affordable\xa0health\xa0care\xa0and\xa0nutrition\xa0 While\xa0fiscal\xa0revenue\xa0improved\xa0since\xa02012,\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0tax?to?GDP\xa0ratio\xa0has\xa0declined\xa0sincethe\xa0end\xa0of\xa0the\xa0crisis.\xa0The\xa0tax\xa0base\xa0consists\xa0 mainly\xa0of\xa0larger,\xa0formal\xa0sector\xa0enterprises,\xa0and\xa0within\xa0tax\xa0and\xa0customs\xa0administration\xa0the\xa0Government\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0simplify\xa0tax\xa0and\xa0customs\xa0clearance\xa0 procedures,\xa0the\xa0VAT\xa0reimbursement\xa0mechanism,\xa0and\xa0implement\xa0recently\xa0adopted\xa0reforms\xa0such\xa0as\xa0the\xa0interconnection\xa0agreement\xa0with\xa0Mali\xa0and\xa0Burkina\xa0 new\xa0borrowing,\xa0especially\xa0in\xa0the\xa0context\xa0of\xa0new\xa0initiatives\xa0in\xa0the\xa0area\xa0of\xa0infrastructure\xa0and\xa0social\xa0spending,\xa0will\xa0increase\xa0debt\xa0service\xa0requirements\xa0over\xa0 the\xa0medium\xa0term.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0the\xa0Government\xa0as\xa0it\xa0seeks\xa0to\xa0strengthen\xa0revenue\xa0collection\xa0through\xa0programmatic\xa0DPO\xa0series,\xa0capacity\xa0building\xa0 and\xa0technical\xa0assistance,\xa0and\xa0budget\xa0support,\xa0investment\xa0lending\xa0and\xa0technical\xa0assistance\xa0for\xa0debt\xa0management.\xa0The\xa0World\xa0Bank\xa0Group\xa0will\xa0provide\xa0 infrastructure\xa0investments\xa0and\xa0improve\xa0service\xa0delivery\x97and\xa0increase\xa0in\xa0debt\xa0service\xa0requirements\xa0over\xa0the\xa0medium\xa0term,\xa0points\xa0to\xa0a\xa0focused\xa0engagement\xa0 \xa0Improvements\xa0in\xa0business\xa0environment\xa0and\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0complimentary\xa0and\xa0synergetic\xa0 prerequisites\xa0for\xa0sustainable\xa0private\xa0sector?led\xa0Growth\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire,\xa0especially\xa0for\xa0SMEs.\xa0While\xa0building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0existing\xa0work\xa0of\xa0IFC\xa0to\xa0provide\xa0firms\xa0with\xa0 access\xa0to\xa0finance,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0enhance\xa0its\xa0support\xa0in\xa0response\xa0to\xa0the\xa0identified\xa0SCD\xa0priority\xa0to\xa0reduce\xa0the\xa0financial\xa0access\xa0gap.\xa0The\xa0Government\xa0has\xa0 articulated\xa0a\xa0private\xa0sector?led\xa0Growth\xa0strategy\xa0fostering\xa0the\xa0development\xa0of\xa0industry\xa0and\xa0SMEs\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance,\xa0including\xa0reforms\xa0to\xa0 improve\xa0the\xa0business\xa0environment,\xa0investment\xa0climate\xa0reform,\xa0and\xa0reforms\xa0in\xa0the\xa0governance\xa0of\xa0the\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0that\xa0will\xa0strengthen\xa0the\xa0capacity\xa0of\xa0 financial\xa0institutions\xa0to\xa0promote\xa0investment\xa0in\xa0agriculture,\xa0agribusiness\xa0and\xa0manufacturing.\xa0The\xa0program\xa0will\xa0support\xa0Growth\xa0opportunities,\xa0especially\xa0for\xa0 SMEs\xa0and\xa0micro?enterprises,\xa0by\xa0addressing\xa0improvements\xa0to\xa0adequate\xa0funding\xa0and\xa0to\xa0financial\xa0services\xa0in\xa0general,\xa0including\xa0banks\xa0and\xa0microcredit\xa0 networks.\xa0Coupled\xa0with\xa0an\xa0improved\xa0business\xa0environment,\xa0a\xa0stronger\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0would\xa0help\xa0spur\xa0entrepreneurship,\xa0MSME\xa0development,\xa0investment\xa0 and\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0\x96\xa0thereby\xa0reducing\xa0poverty\xa0and\xa0promoting\xa0shared\xa0prosperity.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0would\xa0support\xa0regulatory\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0facilitate\xa0business\xa0and\xa0private\xa0 sector\xa0Growth,\xa0and\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance\xa0for\xa0households\xa0and\xa0for\xa0housing,\xa0and\xa0MSME\xa0businesses\xa0through\xa0an\xa0intervention\xa0on\xa0Governance\xa0and\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0 development.\xa0Coordination\xa0will\xa0be\xa0ensured\xa0through\xa0a\xa0set\xa0of\xa0donor\xa0committees\xa0on\xa0Industry/SME\xa0development\xa0and\xa0Private\xa0sector\xa0development/Business\xa0 climate\xa0that\xa0are\xa0led\xa0by\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0and\xa0include\xa0USAID,\xa0UNIDO,\xa0Canada,\xa0EU,\xa0AfDB,\xa0JICA,\xa0and\xa0AFD.\xa0\xa0 . Overall\xa0distance\xa0to\xa0frontier\xa0(DTF)\xa0score\xa0(0\x96 100)\xa0 Baseline:\xa052.26\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa060\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Number\xa0of\xa0MSME\xa0outstanding\xa0loans\xa0 Baseline:\xa00.8\xa0million\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa01.44\xa0million\xa0(2019)\xa0", "\xa0Improve\xa0education\xa0service\xa0delivery\xa0and\xa0youth\xa0employability . Improvements\xa0in\xa0basic\xa0education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0critical\xa0complimentary\xa0inputs\xa0 aimed\xa0at\xa0ensuring\xa0better\xa0access\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0to\xa0more\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0opportunities.\xa0Education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0also\xa0critical\xa0for\xa0the\xa0 economic\xa0transformation\xa0sought\xa0by\xa0the\xa0Government,\xa0and\xa0for\xa0ensuring\xa0that\xa0benefits\xa0from\xa0Growth\xa0reach\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0and\xa0are\xa0equitably\xa0shared.\xa0As\xa0pointed\xa0 out\xa0in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0education\xa0system,\xa0including\xa0technical\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training,\xa0has\xa0suffered\xa0from\xa0weak\xa0governance,\xa0lack\xa0of\xa0a\xa0clearly\xa0defined\xa0 mission,\xa0and\xa0poor\xa0linkages\xa0with\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0stakeholders\xa0and\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs.\xa0Improving\xa0youth\xa0employability\xa0will\xa0require\xa0close\xa0collaboration\xa0between\xa0 institutions\xa0in\xa0charge\xa0of\xa0skill\xa0development,\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0policies,\xa0financial\xa0institutions,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0to\xa0address\xa0the\xa0multiple\xa0constraints\xa0to\xa0higher\xa0 productivity\xa0in\xa0key\xa0economic\xa0sectors.\xa0The\xa0Government\x92s\xa0employment\xa0policy\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0encourage\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0by\xa0supporting\xa0specialized\xa0 training,\xa0calls\xa0for\xa0universal\xa0primary\xa0education,\xa0youth\xa0training\xa0consistent\xa0with\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs;\xa0and\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0vocational\xa0training\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0labor\xa0 productivity.\xa0Building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0successful\xa0Youth\xa0Employment\xa0Project,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0expand\xa0its\xa0support\xa0to\xa0address\xa0more\xa0systemic\xa0issues\xa0such\xa0as\xa0the\xa0mismatch\xa0 between\xa0the\xa0training\xa0provided\xa0by\xa0the\xa0education\xa0system\xa0and\xa0the\xa0country's\xa0needs,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0significant\xa0disparities\xa0across\xa0region,\xa0social?economic\xa0status,\xa0income\xa0 and\xa0gender\xa0in\xa0the\xa0education\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0improvement\xa0in\xa0the\xa0relevance,\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0performance\xa0of\xa0the\xa0education\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training\xa0 systems\xa0to\xa0ensure\xa0better\xa0insertion\xa0and\xa0integration\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0into\xa0the\xa0labor\xa0market.\xa0Promotion\xa0of\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0and\xa0increased\xa0earnings\xa0capabilities\xa0 should\xa0focus\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0productivity\xa0in\xa0self?employment\xa0and\xa0micro?enterprises\xa0where\xa0most\xa0of\xa0the\xa0poor\xa0work.\xa0In\xa0its\xa0support,\xa0the\xa0World\xa0Bank\xa0Group\xa0will\xa0 rely\xa0on\xa0the\xa0complementary\xa0approach\xa0to\xa0regional\xa0support\xa0and\xa0synergies\xa0developed\xa0with\xa0EU,\xa0AFD\xa0and\xa0UNDP\xa0on\xa0support\xa0for\xa0SMEs\xa0and\xa0the\xa0promotion\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0 employment. Percentage\xa0of\xa0participating\xa0graduates\xa0who\xa0are\xa0 employed\xa0or\xa0self?employed\xa06\xa0months\xa0after\xa0 completion\xa0(gender\xa0disaggregated)\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa070%\xa0\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 Percentage\xa0of\xa0students\xa0in\xa0science,\xa0engineering\xa0 and\xa0mathematics\xa0courses\xa0(upper?secondary\xa0and\xa0 tertiary)\xa0(gender\xa0disaggregated):\xa0 - \xa0Upper\xa0Secondary\xa0(mathematics)\xa0 \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Baseline:\xa019.05%\xa0(2014)\xa0(girls\xa05.4%)\xa0 \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Target:\xa040%\xa0(2019)\xa0(girls\xa010%)\xa0 - Tertiary\xa0(Science\xa0&\xa0Engineering):\xa0 \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Baseline:\xa07.5%\xa0(2013)\xa0 \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Target:\xa015%\xa0(2019)\xa0", "Increase\xa0domestic\xa0revenues\xa0and\xa0maintain\xa0debt\xa0sustainability . While\xa0fiscal\xa0revenue\xa0improved\xa0since\xa02012,\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0tax?to?GDP\xa0ratio\xa0has\xa0declined\xa0sincethe\xa0end\xa0of\xa0the\xa0crisis.\xa0The\xa0tax\xa0base\xa0consists\xa0 mainly\xa0of\xa0larger,\xa0formal\xa0sector\xa0enterprises,\xa0and\xa0within\xa0tax\xa0and\xa0customs\xa0administration\xa0the\xa0Government\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0simplify\xa0tax\xa0and\xa0customs\xa0clearance\xa0 procedures,\xa0the\xa0VAT\xa0reimbursement\xa0mechanism,\xa0and\xa0implement\xa0recently\xa0adopted\xa0reforms\xa0such\xa0as\xa0the\xa0interconnection\xa0agreement\xa0with\xa0Mali\xa0and\xa0Burkina\xa0 Faso.\xa0While\xa0debt\xa0relief\xa0has\xa0greatly\xa0improved\xa0the\xa0sustainability\xa0of\xa0the\xa0public\xa0debt\xa0profile,\xa0the\xa0resumption\xa0of\xa0regular\xa0interest\xa0payments\xa0and\xa0the\xa0likelihood\xa0of\xa0 \xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0is\xa0faced\xa0with\xa0significant\xa0accountability\xa0challenges.\xa0Governance\xa0indicators\xa0indicate\xa0poor\xa0performance\xa0in\xa0most\xa0areas,\xa0 and\xa0improved\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0public\xa0goods\xa0and\xa0services,\xa0coupled\xa0with\xa0a\xa0positive\xa0impact\xa0on\xa0accountability\xa0and\xa0anti?corruption.\xa0To\xa0address\xa0these\xa0issues\xa0the\xa0CPF\xa0 proposes\xa0to\xa0provide\xa0support\xa0in\xa0public\xa0financial\xa0management,\xa0particularly\xa0regarding\xa0the\xa0planning,\xa0execution,\xa0and\xa0monitoring\xa0of\xa0expenditures.\xa0Regarding\xa0 citizen\xa0engagement\xa0and\xa0social\xa0accountability,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0support\xa0the\xa0agenda\xa0through\xa0participatory\xa0budgeting\xa0programs\xa0and\xa0use\xa0of\xa0information\xa0 communication\xa0technology\xa0(ICT)\xa0to\xa0provide\xa0for\xa0feed?back\xa0loops\xa0from\xa0ultimate\xa0beneficiaries\xa0to\xa0service?providing\xa0agencies\xa0and\xa0policy\xa0makers.\xa0Many\xa0donors,\xa0 particularly\xa0the\xa0EU,\xa0USAID,\xa0and\xa0AFD\xa0are\xa0involved\xa0in\xa0accountability\xa0and\xa0justice\xa0reform\xa0programs.\xa0\xa0. Corruption\xa0Perception\xa0Index\xa0(Transparency\xa0 International\xa0 Baseline:\xa0(TI)\xa0ranking:\xa0115\xa0(2014)\xa0 Target:\xa0TI\xa0ranking:\xa070\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 C\xf4te\xa0\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0eligibility\xa0for\xa0open\xa0government\xa0 index\xa0(OGP)\xa0\n\nBaseline:\xa0No\xa0(0.5%)\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0Yes\xa0(0.75%)\xa0(2017)\xa0 \n" )

children.para: c("\xa0Improve\xa0Education\xa0service\xa0delivery\xa0and\xa0youth\xa0employability . Improvements\xa0in\xa0basic\xa0Education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0critical\xa0complimentary\xa0inputs\xa0 economic\xa0transformation\xa0sought\xa0by\xa0the\xa0Government,\xa0and\xa0for\xa0ensuring\xa0that\xa0benefits\xa0from\xa0growth\xa0reach\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0and\xa0are\xa0equitably\xa0shared.\xa0As\xa0pointed\xa0 out\xa0in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0Education\xa0system,\xa0including\xa0technical\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training,\xa0has\xa0suffered\xa0from\xa0weak\xa0governance,\xa0lack\xa0of\xa0a\xa0clearly\xa0defined\xa0 mission,\xa0and\xa0poor\xa0linkages\xa0with\xa0Private\xa0sector\xa0stakeholders\xa0and\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs.\xa0Improving\xa0youth\xa0employability\xa0will\xa0require\xa0close\xa0collaboration\xa0between\xa0 ForCtedIvoiretoreduceextremepovertymuchofitsincrementalgrowthwillneedtocomefromtheagriculturesectorasfarmers andsmallholdersaremosttouchedbypoverty.TheSCDanalysisshowsthatagriculturalgrowthwillrequiremeasurestoimproveyieldsbutalsotoreduce inefficienciesintheagribusinessvaluechain,andtheWBGhadalreadystartedworkingonthisissue.CtedIvoirewantstopromotesustained,inclusive andsustainableeconomicgrowth,fullandproductiveemploymentanddecentworkinagriculture,manufacturingandselectedservices.Tohelpthecountry reachitspotentialasworld?classagriculturalcommodityproducer,theCPFprogramproposestoaddresslowproductivityandjobsintheagriculture,agribusinessandmanufacturingvaluechains,whicharecausedbyshortfallsinskillsandtechnology.Productivity?focusedsupportwilltargetthevaluechainin stapleorcashcrops?cocoa,cashewnuts,palmoil;aswellashorticultureandlivestockproducts,underpinnedbyinterlinkedinterventionsundertheother FocusArea1objectives,suchasinfrastructureservicesconnectingagriculturetoagglomerationeconomieswithoutletsforeconomicactivityandtrade, demandforbasicservicesandforjobopportunities.Sustainabilityissuesandclimatechangechallengesinthecommodity?orientedsub?sectorswillbe targeted,throughapproachestoclimate?smartagriculture.Inviewofthelargenumberofruralpoor,agriculturaldevelopmenthasdirectimplicationsfor povertyreduction.TheCPFinterventions,basedontheIFC?WBJointAgribusinessStrategy,willsupportagricultureandagri?businesscompetitivenessin selectedvaluechains,byaccesstomarkets,provisionoftechnologyandtrainingofsmallholders,sectorGovernancereforms,aseriesofIFCproductivityfocusedactions/projectscoveringelementsofthevaluechainincocoa,cotton,cashewnuts,palmoil,rubberandhorticultureproducts.Theseinterventions willbecomplementedbysupportforstaplecropsproductivityandEnvironmentalsustainability,andbuildonsynergiesandpartnershipswithotherdonors oncropproductivity;agribusiness;sectorGovernance;andcapacitybuilding,withCanada,EU,GiZ,AfDB,JICAandFrance. . networks.\xa0Coupled\xa0with\xa0an\xa0improved\xa0business\xa0environment,\xa0a\xa0stronger\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0would\xa0help\xa0spur\xa0entrepreneurship,\xa0MSME\xa0development,\xa0investment\xa0 and\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0\x96\xa0thereby\xa0reducing\xa0poverty\xa0and\xa0promoting\xa0shared\xa0prosperity.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0would\xa0support\xa0regulatory\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0facilitate\xa0business\xa0and\xa0private\xa0 Formalizing\xa0and\xa0enhancing\xa0Access\xa0to\xa0land\xa0for\xa0people\xa0and\xa0business\xa0is\xa0a\xa0priority\xa0and\xa0key\xa0to\xa0stability,\xa0reduction\xa0in\xa0fragility,and\xa0development. The\xa0Government\xa0considers\xa0land\xa0security\xa0a\xa0prerequisite\xa0for\xa0the\xa0modernization\xa0of\xa0the\xa0agriculture\xa0sector.\xa0Clear\xa0land\xa0rights\xa0and\xa0informed\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0are\xa0 an\xa0incentive\xa0for\xa0both\xa0smallholders\xa0and\xa0private\xa0investors\xa0and\xa0a\xa0key\xa0prerequisite\xa0for\xa0shared\xa0growth.\xa0Access\xa0to\xa0industrial\xa0land\xa0with\xa0adequate\xa0infrastructure\xa0is\xa0 in\xa0high\xa0demand\xa0from\xa0new\xa0investors.\xa0Improving\xa0the\xa0governance\xa0of\xa0urban\xa0land\xa0is\xa0especially\xa0important\xa0to\xa0the\xa0Ivorian\xa0urban\xa0population,\xa0which\xa0continues\xa0to\xa0 grow\xa0rapidly.\xa0Land\xa0rights\xa0formalization\xa0is\xa0crucial\xa0for\xa0the\xa0gradual\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0a\xa0documented\xa0land\xa0market\xa0that\xa0provides\xa0confidence\xa0to\xa0stakeholders\xa0 and\xa0facilitate\xa0solid\xa0business\xa0transactions.\xa0A\xa0transparent\xa0land\xa0market\xa0will\xa0be\xa0conducive\xa0to\xa0investment\xa0and\xa0increased\xa0productivity.\xa0Responding\xa0to\xa0the\xa0SCD\xa0 emphasis\xa0on\xa0the\xa0importance\xa0of\xa0land\xa0reform,\xa0the\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0improvement\xa0to\xa0the\xa0land\xa0management\xa0system\xa0through\xa0a\xa0Land\xa0Reform\xa0Implementation\xa0 Project,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as\xa0crosscutting\xa0engagement\xa0in\xa0other\xa0operations,\xa0focusing\xa0on\xa0sustainability\xa0of\xa0agricultural\xa0value\xa0chains\xa0in\xa0rural\xa0areas,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0completion\xa0of\xa0 the\xa0land\xa0policy\xa0design\xa0and\xa0land\xa0rights\xa0registration.\xa0Support\xa0will\xa0be\xa0coordinated\xa0through\xa0the\xa0thematic\xa0working\xa0group\xa0on\xa0rural\xa0land\xa0that\xa0is\xa0co?led\xa0by\xa0the\xa0EU\xa0 and\xa0the\xa0WB,\xa0and\xa0includes\xa0AfDB,\xa0AFD\xa0and\xa0FAO. Number\xa0of\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0and\xa0leases\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0100,000\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 Private\xa0investment\xa0catalyzed\xa0in\xa0industrial\xa0and\xa0 Special\xa0Economic\xa0Zones\xa0(as\xa0measured\xa0by\xa0 AGEDI\xa0and\xa0CEPICI))\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0US$50\xa0million\xa0(2019)\xa0\n" )

Formalizing\xa0and\xa0enhancing\xa0access\xa0to\xa0land\xa0for\xa0people\xa0and\xa0business\xa0is\xa0a\xa0priority\xa0and\xa0key\xa0to\xa0stability,\xa0reduction\xa0in\xa0fragility,and\xa0development. The\xa0Government\xa0considers\xa0land\xa0security\xa0a\xa0prerequisite\xa0for\xa0the\xa0modernization\xa0of\xa0the\xa0agriculture\xa0sector.\xa0Clear\xa0land\xa0rights\xa0and\xa0informed\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0are\xa0 an\xa0incentive\xa0for\xa0both\xa0smallholders\xa0and\xa0private\xa0investors\xa0and\xa0a\xa0key\xa0prerequisite\xa0for\xa0shared\xa0growth.\xa0Access\xa0to\xa0industrial\xa0land\xa0with\xa0adequate\xa0infrastructure\xa0is\xa0 in\xa0high\xa0demand\xa0from\xa0new\xa0investors.\xa0Improving\xa0the\xa0governance\xa0of\xa0urban\xa0land\xa0is\xa0especially\xa0important\xa0to\xa0the\xa0Ivorian\xa0urban\xa0population,\xa0which\xa0continues\xa0to\xa0 grow\xa0rapidly.\xa0Land\xa0rights\xa0formalization\xa0is\xa0crucial\xa0for\xa0the\xa0gradual\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0a\xa0documented\xa0land\xa0market\xa0that\xa0provides\xa0confidence\xa0to\xa0stakeholders\xa0 and\xa0facilitate\xa0solid\xa0business\xa0transactions.\xa0A\xa0transparent\xa0land\xa0market\xa0will\xa0be\xa0conducive\xa0to\xa0investment\xa0and\xa0increased\xa0productivity.\xa0Responding\xa0to\xa0the\xa0SCD\xa0 emphasis\xa0on\xa0the\xa0importance\xa0of\xa0land\xa0reform,\xa0the\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0improvement\xa0to\xa0the\xa0land\xa0management\xa0system\xa0through\xa0a\xa0Land\xa0Reform\xa0Implementation\xa0 Project,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as\xa0crosscutting\xa0engagement\xa0in\xa0other\xa0operations,\xa0focusing\xa0on\xa0sustainability\xa0of\xa0agricultural\xa0value\xa0chains\xa0in\xa0rural\xa0areas,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0completion\xa0of\xa0 the\xa0land\xa0policy\xa0design\xa0and\xa0land\xa0rights\xa0registration.\xa0Support\xa0will\xa0be\xa0coordinated\xa0through\xa0the\xa0thematic\xa0working\xa0group\xa0on\xa0rural\xa0land\xa0that\xa0is\xa0co?led\xa0by\xa0the\xa0EU\xa0 and\xa0the\xa0WB,\xa0and\xa0includes\xa0AfDB,\xa0AFD\xa0and\xa0FAO. Number\xa0of\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0and\xa0leases\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0100,000\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 Private\xa0investment\xa0catalyzed\xa0in\xa0industrial\xa0and\xa0 Special\xa0Economic\xa0Zones\xa0(as\xa0measured\xa0by\xa0 AGEDI\xa0and\xa0CEPICI))\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0US$50\xa0million\xa0(2019)\xa0\n", "\xa0Improve\xa0education\xa0service\xa0delivery\xa0and\xa0youth\xa0employability . Improvements\xa0in\xa0basic\xa0education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0critical\xa0complimentary\xa0inputs\xa0 aimed\xa0at\xa0ensuring\xa0better\xa0access\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0to\xa0more\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0opportunities.\xa0Education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0also\xa0critical\xa0for\xa0the\xa0 economic\xa0transformation\xa0sought\xa0by\xa0the\xa0Government,\xa0and\xa0for\xa0ensuring\xa0that\xa0benefits\xa0from\xa0growth\xa0reach\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0and\xa0are\xa0equitably\xa0shared.\xa0As\xa0pointed\xa0 out\xa0in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0education\xa0system,\xa0including\xa0technical\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training,\xa0has\xa0suffered\xa0from\xa0weak\xa0governance,\xa0lack\xa0of\xa0a\xa0clearly\xa0defined\xa0 mission,\xa0and\xa0poor\xa0linkages\xa0with\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0stakeholders\xa0and\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs.\xa0Improving\xa0youth\xa0employability\xa0will\xa0require\xa0close\xa0collaboration\xa0between\xa0 Institutions\xa0in\xa0charge\xa0of\xa0skill\xa0development,\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0policies,\xa0Financial\xa0Institutions,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0to\xa0address\xa0the\xa0multiple\xa0constraints\xa0to\xa0higher\xa0 productivity\xa0in\xa0key\xa0economic\xa0sectors.\xa0The\xa0Government\x92s\xa0employment\xa0policy\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0encourage\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0by\xa0supporting\xa0specialized\xa0 training,\xa0calls\xa0for\xa0universal\xa0primary\xa0education,\xa0youth\xa0training\xa0consistent\xa0with\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs;\xa0and\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0vocational\xa0training\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0labor\xa0 productivity.\xa0Building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0successful\xa0Youth\xa0Employment\xa0Project,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0expand\xa0its\xa0support\xa0to\xa0address\xa0more\xa0systemic\xa0issues\xa0such\xa0as\xa0the\xa0mismatch\xa0 between\xa0the\xa0training\xa0provided\xa0by\xa0the\xa0education\xa0system\xa0and\xa0the\xa0country's\xa0needs,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0significant\xa0disparities\xa0across\xa0region,\xa0social?economic\xa0status,\xa0income\xa0 and\xa0gender\xa0in\xa0the\xa0education\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0improvement\xa0in\xa0the\xa0relevance,\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0performance\xa0of\xa0the\xa0education\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training\xa0 systems\xa0to\xa0ensure\xa0better\xa0insertion\xa0and\xa0integration\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0into\xa0the\xa0labor\xa0market.\xa0Promotion\xa0of\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0and\xa0increased\xa0earnings\xa0capabilities\xa0 should\xa0focus\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0productivity\xa0in\xa0self?employment\xa0and\xa0micro?enterprises\xa0where\xa0most\xa0of\xa0the\xa0poor\xa0work.\xa0In\xa0its\xa0support,\xa0the\xa0World\xa0Bank\xa0Group\xa0will\xa0 rely\xa0on\xa0the\xa0complementary\xa0approach\xa0to\xa0regional\xa0support\xa0and\xa0synergies\xa0developed\xa0with\xa0EU,\xa0AFD\xa0and\xa0UNDP\xa0on\xa0support\xa0for\xa0SMEs\xa0and\xa0the\xa0promotion\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0 employment. \xa0In\xa0spite\xa0of\xa0a\xa0number\xa0of\xa0measures\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0the\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0spending,\xa0monitoring\xa0the\xa0status\xa0of\xa0arrears,\xa0ensuring\xa0that\xa0comprehensive\xa0 development\xa0and\xa0public\xa0service\xa0delivery.\xa0The\xa0World\xa0Bank\xa0has\xa0provided\xa0long\xa0support\xa0to\xa0Public\xa0Financial\xa0Management,\xa0but\xa0the\xa0SCD\xa0noted\xa0that\xa0despite improve\xa0the\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0expenditure\xa0through\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0the\xa0PFM\xa0action\xa0plan;\xa0and\xa0improvement\xa0of\xa0the\xa0central\xa0government\x92s\xa0performance?based\xa0 \xa0Access\xa0to\xa0clean\xa0water\xa0and\xa0Health\xa0services\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0key\xa0complementary\xa0and\xa0synergetic\xa0Health\xa0and\xa0 nutrition\xa0determinants.\xa0\xa0Given\xa0its\xa0income\xa0level,\xa0Health\xa0indicators\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0are\xa0among\xa0the\xa0weakest\xa0in\xa0the\xa0region.\xa0The\xa0key\xa0binding\xa0constraints\xa0to\xa0Health\xa0 service\xa0utilization\xa0are\xa0access,\xa0affordability,\xa0availability,\xa0and\xa0acceptability.\xa0The\xa0WBG\xa0program\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0support\xa0Government\x92s\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0its\xa0Health\xa0 policy,\xa0which\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0the\xa0use\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0Health\xa0services,\xa0improve\xa0maternal,\xa0and\xa0child\xa0Health\xa0services;\xa0and\xa0reinforce\xa0prevention,\xa0Health\xa0promotion\xa0 and\xa0medical\xa0outreach.\xa0To\xa0complement\xa0the\xa0efforts\xa0on\xa0improving\xa0Health\xa0services\xa0provision,\xa0WBG\x92s\xa0interventions\xa0aimed\xa0at\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0supply\xa0and\xa0 sanitation\xa0services\xa0will\xa0improve\xa0living\xa0conditions,\xa0reduce\xa0public\xa0expenses\xa0for\xa0water?borne\xa0diseases\xa0and\xa0increase\xa0income?generation\xa0activities,\xa0particularly\xa0 for\xa0women.\xa0Addressing\xa0the\xa0urgent\xa0needs\xa0in\xa0a\xa0financially\xa0sustainable\xa0way\xa0will\xa0also\xa0provide\xa0the\xa0foundation\xa0for\xa0implementing\xa0sector\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0will\xa0support\xa0 further\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0water\xa0and\xa0sanitation\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0proposes\xa0to\xa0focus\xa0its\xa0support\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0the\xa0access\xa0to\xa0essential\xa0Health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0water\xa0 services,\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0the\xa0level\xa0of\xa0financial\xa0Health\xa0protection\xa0for\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0groups.\xa0Enhanced\xa0access\xa0to\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0affordable\xa0Health\xa0care\xa0and\xa0nutrition\xa0 services\xa0across\xa0all\xa0segments\xa0of\xa0the\xa0population\xa0would\xa0have\xa0strong\xa0impact\xa0on\xa0inclusive\xa0growth\xa0and\xa0human\xa0capital\xa0development.\xa0This\xa0responds\xa0to\xa0the\xa0analysis\xa0 in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0which\xa0pointed\xa0out\xa0that\xa0access\xa0to\xa0and\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0Health\xa0care\xa0will\xa0require\xa0considerable\xa0changes\xa0in\xa0resource\xa0allocation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0sector,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as institutional\xa0reforms\xa0and\xa0strengthening\xa0governance\xa0and\xa0accountability\xa0of\xa0the\xa0Health\xa0system,\xa0and\xa0that\xa0better\xa0access\xa0to\xa0drinking\xa0water\xa0is\xa0of\xa0particular\xa0 importance\xa0in\xa0the\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0Health\xa0care.\xa0Coordination\xa0with\xa0the\xa0number\xa0of\xa0donors\xa0active\xa0in\xa0the\xa0Health,\xa0nutrition\xa0and\xa0population\xa0areas\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0will\xa0 be\xa0essential,\xa0including\xa0AFD,\xa0EU\xa0UNFPA;\xa0Global\xa0Fund\xa0for\xa0malaria;\xa0USAID;\xa0and\xa0UNICEF.\xa0\xa0 . \xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0is\xa0faced\xa0with\xa0significant\xa0accountability\xa0challenges.\xa0Governance\xa0indicators\xa0indicate\xa0poor\xa0performance\xa0in\xa0most\xa0areas,\xa0 including\xa0Citizen\xa0Engagement\xa0and\xa0social\xa0accountability,\xa0the\xa0judiciary\xa0system,\xa0and\xa0transparency\xa0in\xa0public\xa0sector\xa0management.\xa0Improvement\xa0of\xa0the\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0 expenditure\xa0requires\xa0enhanced\xa0systems,\xa0processes,\xa0and\xa0accountability\xa0for\xa0investment\xa0selection,\xa0financing,\xa0monitoring,\xa0and\xa0evaluation.\xa0The\xa0SCD\xa0points\xa0out\xa0 that\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0has\xa0lagged\xa0significantly\xa0in\xa0the\xa0areas\xa0of\xa0rule\xa0of\xa0law,\xa0voice\xa0and\xa0accountability,\xa0and\xa0regulatory\xa0quality,\xa0and\xa0that\xa0good\xa0governance\xa0 encompasses,\xa0inter\xa0alia,\xa0concrete\xa0measures\xa0against\xa0corruption,\xa0an\xa0improved\xa0public\xa0administration,\xa0and\xa0enhanced\xa0access\xa0to\xa0justice\xa0and\xa0more\xa0transparent\xa0 and\xa0predICTable\xa0relations\xa0between\xa0government\xa0and\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector.\xa0Better\xa0expenditure\xa0management\xa0should\xa0lead\xa0to\xa0reduced\xa0cost\xa0overruns,\xa0less\xa0debt,\xa0 and\xa0improved\xa0quality\xa0of\xa0public\xa0goods\xa0and\xa0services,\xa0coupled\xa0with\xa0a\xa0positive\xa0impact\xa0on\xa0accountability\xa0and\xa0anti?corruption.\xa0To\xa0address\xa0these\xa0issues\xa0the\xa0CPF\xa0 proposes\xa0to\xa0provide\xa0support\xa0in\xa0public\xa0financial\xa0management,\xa0particularly\xa0regarding\xa0the\xa0planning,\xa0execution,\xa0and\xa0monitoring\xa0of\xa0expenditures.\xa0Regarding\xa0 Citizen\xa0Engagement\xa0and\xa0social\xa0accountability,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0support\xa0the\xa0agenda\xa0through\xa0participatory\xa0budgeting\xa0programs\xa0and\xa0use\xa0of\xa0information\xa0 communication\xa0technology\xa0(ICT)\xa0to\xa0provide\xa0for\xa0feed?back\xa0loops\xa0from\xa0ultimate\xa0beneficiaries\xa0to\xa0service?providing\xa0agencies\xa0and\xa0policy\xa0makers.\xa0Many\xa0donors,\xa0 particularly\xa0the\xa0EU,\xa0USAID,\xa0and\xa0AFD\xa0are\xa0involved\xa0in\xa0accountability\xa0and\xa0justice\xa0reform\xa0programs.\xa0\xa0. children.name: Corruption and Growth
children.para: c("\xa0\xa0Improve\xa0business\xa0regulatory\xa0framework\xa0and\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance . \xa0Improvements\xa0in\xa0business\xa0environment\xa0and\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0complimentary\xa0and\xa0synergetic\xa0 prerequisites\xa0for\xa0sustainable\xa0private\xa0sector?led\xa0Growth\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire,\xa0especially\xa0for\xa0SMEs.\xa0While\xa0building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0existing\xa0work\xa0of\xa0IFC\xa0to\xa0provide\xa0firms\xa0with\xa0 access\xa0to\xa0finance,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0enhance\xa0its\xa0support\xa0in\xa0response\xa0to\xa0the\xa0identified\xa0SCD\xa0priority\xa0to\xa0reduce\xa0the\xa0financial\xa0access\xa0gap.\xa0The\xa0Government\xa0has\xa0 articulated\xa0a\xa0private\xa0sector?led\xa0Growth\xa0strategy\xa0fostering\xa0the\xa0development\xa0of\xa0industry\xa0and\xa0SMEs\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance,\xa0including\xa0reforms\xa0to\xa0 improve\xa0the\xa0business\xa0environment,\xa0investment\xa0climate\xa0reform,\xa0and\xa0reforms\xa0in\xa0the\xa0governance\xa0of\xa0the\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0that\xa0will\xa0strengthen\xa0the\xa0capacity\xa0of\xa0 financial\xa0institutions\xa0to\xa0promote\xa0investment\xa0in\xa0agriculture,\xa0agribusiness\xa0and\xa0manufacturing.\xa0The\xa0program\xa0will\xa0support\xa0Growth\xa0opportunities,\xa0especially\xa0for\xa0 SMEs\xa0and\xa0micro?enterprises,\xa0by\xa0addressing\xa0improvements\xa0to\xa0adequate\xa0funding\xa0and\xa0to\xa0financial\xa0services\xa0in\xa0general,\xa0including\xa0banks\xa0and\xa0microcredit\xa0 networks.\xa0Coupled\xa0with\xa0an\xa0improved\xa0business\xa0environment,\xa0a\xa0stronger\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0would\xa0help\xa0spur\xa0entrepreneurship,\xa0MSME\xa0development,\xa0investment\xa0 and\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0\x96\xa0thereby\xa0reducing\xa0poverty\xa0and\xa0promoting\xa0shared\xa0prosperity.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0would\xa0support\xa0regulatory\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0facilitate\xa0business\xa0and\xa0private\xa0 sector\xa0Growth,\xa0and\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance\xa0for\xa0households\xa0and\xa0for\xa0housing,\xa0and\xa0MSME\xa0businesses\xa0through\xa0an\xa0intervention\xa0on\xa0Governance\xa0and\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0 development.\xa0Coordination\xa0will\xa0be\xa0ensured\xa0through\xa0a\xa0set\xa0of\xa0donor\xa0committees\xa0on\xa0Industry/SME\xa0development\xa0and\xa0Private\xa0sector\xa0development/Business\xa0 climate\xa0that\xa0are\xa0led\xa0by\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0and\xa0include\xa0USAID,\xa0UNIDO,\xa0Canada,\xa0EU,\xa0AfDB,\xa0JICA,\xa0and\xa0AFD.\xa0\xa0 . Overall\xa0distance\xa0to\xa0frontier\xa0(DTF)\xa0score\xa0(0\x96 100)\xa0 Baseline:\xa052.26\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa060\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Number\xa0of\xa0MSME\xa0outstanding\xa0loans\xa0 Baseline:\xa00.8\xa0million\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa01.44\xa0million\xa0(2019)\xa0", "\xa0Improve\xa0education\xa0service\xa0delivery\xa0and\xa0youth\xa0employability . Improvements\xa0in\xa0basic\xa0education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0critical\xa0complimentary\xa0inputs\xa0 aimed\xa0at\xa0ensuring\xa0better\xa0access\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0to\xa0more\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0opportunities.\xa0Education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0also\xa0critical\xa0for\xa0the\xa0 economic\xa0transformation\xa0sought\xa0by\xa0the\xa0Government,\xa0and\xa0for\xa0ensuring\xa0that\xa0benefits\xa0from\xa0Growth\xa0reach\xa0the\xa0poorest\xa0and\xa0are\xa0equitably\xa0shared.\xa0As\xa0pointed\xa0 out\xa0in\xa0the\xa0SCD,\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0education\xa0system,\xa0including\xa0technical\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training,\xa0has\xa0suffered\xa0from\xa0weak\xa0governance,\xa0lack\xa0of\xa0a\xa0clearly\xa0defined\xa0 mission,\xa0and\xa0poor\xa0linkages\xa0with\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0stakeholders\xa0and\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs.\xa0Improving\xa0youth\xa0employability\xa0will\xa0require\xa0close\xa0collaboration\xa0between\xa0 institutions\xa0in\xa0charge\xa0of\xa0skill\xa0development,\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0policies,\xa0financial\xa0institutions,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0to\xa0address\xa0the\xa0multiple\xa0constraints\xa0to\xa0higher\xa0 productivity\xa0in\xa0key\xa0economic\xa0sectors.\xa0The\xa0Government\x92s\xa0employment\xa0policy\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0encourage\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0by\xa0supporting\xa0specialized\xa0 training,\xa0calls\xa0for\xa0universal\xa0primary\xa0education,\xa0youth\xa0training\xa0consistent\xa0with\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs;\xa0and\xa0expansion\xa0of\xa0vocational\xa0training\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0labor\xa0 productivity.\xa0Building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0successful\xa0Youth\xa0Employment\xa0Project,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0expand\xa0its\xa0support\xa0to\xa0address\xa0more\xa0systemic\xa0issues\xa0such\xa0as\xa0the\xa0mismatch\xa0 between\xa0the\xa0training\xa0provided\xa0by\xa0the\xa0education\xa0system\xa0and\xa0the\xa0country's\xa0needs,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0significant\xa0disparities\xa0across\xa0region,\xa0social?economic\xa0status,\xa0income\xa0 and\xa0gender\xa0in\xa0the\xa0education\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0improvement\xa0in\xa0the\xa0relevance,\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0performance\xa0of\xa0the\xa0education\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training\xa0 The\xa0Government\xa0considers\xa0land\xa0security\xa0a\xa0prerequisite\xa0for\xa0the\xa0modernization\xa0of\xa0the\xa0agriculture\xa0sector.\xa0Clear\xa0land\xa0rights\xa0and\xa0informed\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0are\xa0 an\xa0incentive\xa0for\xa0both\xa0smallholders\xa0and\xa0private\xa0investors\xa0and\xa0a\xa0key\xa0prerequisite\xa0for\xa0shared\xa0Growth.\xa0Access\xa0to\xa0industrial\xa0land\xa0with\xa0adequate\xa0Infrastructure\xa0is\xa0 in\xa0high\xa0demand\xa0from\xa0new\xa0investors.\xa0Improving\xa0the\xa0governance\xa0of\xa0urban\xa0land\xa0is\xa0especially\xa0important\xa0to\xa0the\xa0Ivorian\xa0urban\xa0population,\xa0which\xa0continues\xa0to\xa0 grow\xa0rapidly.\xa0Land\xa0rights\xa0formalization\xa0is\xa0crucial\xa0for\xa0the\xa0gradual\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0a\xa0documented\xa0land\xa0market\xa0that\xa0provides\xa0confidence\xa0to\xa0stakeholders\xa0 and\xa0facilitate\xa0solid\xa0business\xa0transactions.\xa0A\xa0transparent\xa0land\xa0market\xa0will\xa0be\xa0conducive\xa0to\xa0investment\xa0and\xa0increased\xa0productivity.\xa0Responding\xa0to\xa0the\xa0SCD\xa0 emphasis\xa0on\xa0the\xa0importance\xa0of\xa0land\xa0reform,\xa0the\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0improvement\xa0to\xa0the\xa0land\xa0management\xa0system\xa0through\xa0a\xa0Land\xa0Reform\xa0Implementation\xa0 Project,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as\xa0crosscutting\xa0engagement\xa0in\xa0other\xa0operations,\xa0focusing\xa0on\xa0sustainability\xa0of\xa0agricultural\xa0value\xa0chains\xa0in\xa0rural\xa0areas,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0completion\xa0of\xa0 the\xa0land\xa0policy\xa0design\xa0and\xa0land\xa0rights\xa0registration.\xa0Support\xa0will\xa0be\xa0coordinated\xa0through\xa0the\xa0thematic\xa0working\xa0group\xa0on\xa0rural\xa0land\xa0that\xa0is\xa0co?led\xa0by\xa0the\xa0EU\xa0 and\xa0the\xa0WB,\xa0and\xa0includes\xa0AfDB,\xa0AFD\xa0and\xa0FAO. The\xa0Government\xa0considers\xa0land\xa0security\xa0a\xa0prerequisite\xa0for\xa0the\xa0modernization\xa0of\xa0the\xa0agriculture\xa0sector.\xa0Clear\xa0land\xa0rights\xa0and\xa0informed\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0are\xa0 an\xa0incentive\xa0for\xa0both\xa0smallholders\xa0and\xa0private\xa0investors\xa0and\xa0a\xa0key\xa0prerequisite\xa0for\xa0shared\xa0Growth.\xa0Access\xa0to\xa0industrial\xa0land\xa0with\xa0adequate\xa0infrastructure\xa0is\xa0 in\xa0high\xa0demand\xa0from\xa0new\xa0investors.\xa0Improving\xa0the\xa0governance\xa0of\xa0urban\xa0land\xa0is\xa0especially\xa0important\xa0to\xa0the\xa0Ivorian\xa0urban\xa0population,\xa0which\xa0continues\xa0to\xa0 grow\xa0rapidly.\xa0Land\xa0rights\xa0formalization\xa0is\xa0crucial\xa0for\xa0the\xa0gradual\xa0implementation\xa0of\xa0a\xa0documented\xa0land\xa0market\xa0that\xa0provides\xa0confidence\xa0to\xa0stakeholders\xa0 and\xa0facilitate\xa0solid\xa0business\xa0transactions.\xa0A\xa0transparent\xa0land\xa0market\xa0will\xa0be\xa0conducive\xa0to\xa0investment\xa0and\xa0increased\xa0productivity.\xa0Responding\xa0to\xa0the\xa0SCD\xa0 emphasis\xa0on\xa0the\xa0importance\xa0of\xa0land\xa0reform,\xa0the\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0improvement\xa0to\xa0the\xa0land\xa0management\xa0system\xa0through\xa0a\xa0Land\xa0Reform\xa0Implementation\xa0 Project,\xa0as\xa0well\xa0as\xa0crosscutting\xa0engagement\xa0in\xa0other\xa0operations,\xa0focusing\xa0on\xa0sustainability\xa0of\xa0agricultural\xa0value\xa0chains\xa0in\xa0rural\xa0areas,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0completion\xa0of\xa0 the\xa0land\xa0policy\xa0design\xa0and\xa0land\xa0rights\xa0registration.\xa0Support\xa0will\xa0be\xa0coordinated\xa0through\xa0the\xa0thematic\xa0working\xa0group\xa0on\xa0rural\xa0land\xa0that\xa0is\xa0co?led\xa0by\xa0the\xa0EU\xa0 and\xa0the\xa0WB,\xa0and\xa0includes\xa0AfDB,\xa0AFD\xa0and\xa0FAO. Number\xa0of\xa0land\xa0transactions\xa0and\xa0leases\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0100,000\xa0(2019)\xa0 \xa0 Private\xa0investment\xa0catalyzed\xa0in\xa0industrial\xa0and\xa0 Special\xa0Economic\xa0Zones\xa0(as\xa0measured\xa0by\xa0 AGEDI\xa0and\xa0CEPICI))\xa0 Baseline:\xa00\xa0(2015)\xa0 Target:\xa0US$50\xa0million\xa0(2019)\xa0\n", "Increase\xa0domestic\xa0revenues\xa0and\xa0maintain\xa0debt\xa0sustainability . While\xa0fiscal\xa0revenue\xa0improved\xa0since\xa02012,\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0tax?to?GDP\xa0ratio\xa0has\xa0declined\xa0sincethe\xa0end\xa0of\xa0the\xa0crisis.\xa0The\xa0tax\xa0base\xa0consists\xa0 mainly\xa0of\xa0larger,\xa0formal\xa0sector\xa0enterprises,\xa0and\xa0within\xa0tax\xa0and\xa0customs\xa0administration\xa0the\xa0Government\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0simplify\xa0tax\xa0and\xa0customs\xa0clearance\xa0 procedures,\xa0the\xa0VAT\xa0reimbursement\xa0mechanism,\xa0and\xa0implement\xa0recently\xa0adopted\xa0reforms\xa0such\xa0as\xa0the\xa0interconnection\xa0agreement\xa0with\xa0Mali\xa0and\xa0Burkina\xa0 Faso.\xa0While\xa0debt\xa0relief\xa0has\xa0greatly\xa0improved\xa0the\xa0sustainability\xa0of\xa0the\xa0public\xa0debt\xa0profile,\xa0the\xa0resumption\xa0of\xa0regular\xa0interest\xa0payments\xa0and\xa0the\xa0likelihood\xa0of\xa0 new\xa0borrowing,\xa0especially\xa0in\xa0the\xa0context\xa0of\xa0new\xa0initiatives\xa0in\xa0the\xa0area\xa0of\xa0infrastructure\xa0and\xa0social\xa0spending,\xa0will\xa0increase\xa0debt\xa0service\xa0requirements\xa0over\xa0 the\xa0medium\xa0term.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0the\xa0Government\xa0as\xa0it\xa0seeks\xa0to\xa0strengthen\xa0revenue\xa0collection\xa0through\xa0programmatic\xa0DPO\xa0series,\xa0capacity\xa0building\xa0 support\xa0to\xa0tax\xa0and\xa0customs\xa0administration\xa0training\xa0and\xa0information\xa0systems\xa0complementary\xa0to\xa0interventions\xa0by\xa0the\xa0IMF,\xa0the\xa0EU\xa0and\xa0the\xa0Canadian\xa0 and\xa0barriers\xa0pertaining\xa0to\xa0licensing,\xa0inspections,\xa0and\xa0taxes\xa0needs\xa0to\xa0facilitate\xa0business\xa0operations,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\x92s\xa0rank\xa0near\xa0the\xa0bottom\xa0on\xa0the\xa0 children.para: c("Improve\xa0productivity\xa0in\xa0Agriculture/Agribusiness\xa0value\xa0chains. For\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0to\xa0reduce\xa0extreme\xa0poverty\xa0much\xa0of\xa0its\xa0incremental\xa0Growth\xa0will\xa0need\xa0to\xa0come\xa0from\xa0the\xa0agriculture\xa0sector\xa0as\xa0farmers\xa0 and\xa0smallholders\xa0are\xa0most\xa0touched\xa0by\xa0poverty.\xa0The\xa0SCD\xa0analysis\xa0shows\xa0that\xa0agricultural\xa0Growth\xa0will\xa0require\xa0measures\xa0to\xa0improve\xa0yields\xa0but\xa0also\xa0to\xa0reduce\xa0 inefficiencies\xa0in\xa0the\xa0agribusiness\xa0value\xa0chain,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0had\xa0already\xa0started\xa0working\xa0on\xa0this\xa0issue.\xa0\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire\xa0wants\xa0to\xa0promote\xa0sustained,\xa0inclusive\xa0 and\xa0sustainable\xa0economic\xa0Growth,\xa0full\xa0and\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0and\xa0decent\xa0work\xa0in\xa0agriculture,\xa0manufacturing\xa0and\xa0selected\xa0services.\xa0To\xa0help\xa0the\xa0country\xa0 prerequisites\xa0for\xa0sustainable\xa0private\xa0sector?led\xa0Growth\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire,\xa0especially\xa0for\xa0SMEs.\xa0While\xa0building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0existing\xa0work\xa0of\xa0IFC\xa0to\xa0provide\xa0firms\xa0with\xa0 access\xa0to\xa0finance,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0enhance\xa0its\xa0support\xa0in\xa0response\xa0to\xa0the\xa0identified\xa0SCD\xa0priority\xa0to\xa0reduce\xa0the\xa0financial\xa0access\xa0gap.\xa0The\xa0Government\xa0has\xa0 articulated\xa0a\xa0private\xa0sector?led\xa0Growth\xa0strategy\xa0fostering\xa0the\xa0development\xa0of\xa0industry\xa0and\xa0SMEs\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance,\xa0including\xa0reforms\xa0to\xa0 improve\xa0the\xa0business\xa0environment,\xa0investment\xa0climate\xa0reform,\xa0and\xa0reforms\xa0in\xa0the\xa0governance\xa0of\xa0the\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0that\xa0will\xa0strengthen\xa0the\xa0capacity\xa0of\xa0 financial\xa0Institutions\xa0to\xa0promote\xa0investment\xa0in\xa0agriculture,\xa0agribusiness\xa0and\xa0manufacturing.\xa0The\xa0program\xa0will\xa0support\xa0Growth\xa0opportunities,\xa0especially\xa0for\xa0 SMEs\xa0and\xa0micro?enterprises,\xa0by\xa0addressing\xa0improvements\xa0to\xa0adequate\xa0funding\xa0and\xa0to\xa0financial\xa0services\xa0in\xa0general,\xa0including\xa0banks\xa0and\xa0microcredit\xa0 networks.\xa0Coupled\xa0with\xa0an\xa0improved\xa0business\xa0environment,\xa0a\xa0stronger\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0would\xa0help\xa0spur\xa0entrepreneurship,\xa0MSME\xa0development,\xa0investment\xa0 and\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0\x96\xa0thereby\xa0reducing\xa0poverty\xa0and\xa0promoting\xa0shared\xa0prosperity.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0would\xa0support\xa0regulatory\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0facilitate\xa0business\xa0and\xa0private\xa0 sector\xa0Growth,\xa0and\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance\xa0for\xa0households\xa0and\xa0for\xa0housing,\xa0and\xa0MSME\xa0businesses\xa0through\xa0an\xa0intervention\xa0on\xa0Governance\xa0and\xa0financial\xa0sector\xa0 development.\xa0Coordination\xa0will\xa0be\xa0ensured\xa0through\xa0a\xa0set\xa0of\xa0donor\xa0committees\xa0on\xa0Industry/SME\xa0development\xa0and\xa0Private\xa0sector\xa0development/Business\xa0 climate\xa0that\xa0are\xa0led\xa0by\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0and\xa0include\xa0USAID,\xa0UNIDO,\xa0Canada,\xa0EU,\xa0AfDB,\xa0JICA,\xa0and\xa0AFD.\xa0\xa0 . Improvements\xa0in\xa0basic\xa0education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0combined\xa0in\xa0one\xa0objective\xa0as\xa0both\xa0are\xa0critical\xa0complimentary\xa0inputs\xa0 aimed\xa0at\xa0ensuring\xa0better\xa0access\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0to\xa0more\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0opportunities.\xa0Education\xa0and\xa0market?responsive\xa0skills\xa0are\xa0also\xa0critical\xa0for\xa0the\xa0 mission,\xa0and\xa0poor\xa0linkages\xa0with\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0stakeholders\xa0and\xa0labor\xa0market\xa0needs.\xa0Improving\xa0youth\xa0employability\xa0will\xa0require\xa0close\xa0collaboration\xa0between\xa0 productivity\xa0in\xa0key\xa0economic\xa0sectors.\xa0The\xa0Government\x92s\xa0employment\xa0policy\xa0aims\xa0to\xa0encourage\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0in\xa0the\xa0private\xa0sector\xa0by\xa0supporting\xa0specialized\xa0 productivity.\xa0Building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0successful\xa0Youth\xa0Employment\xa0Project,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0expand\xa0its\xa0support\xa0to\xa0address\xa0more\xa0systemic\xa0issues\xa0such\xa0as\xa0the\xa0mismatch\xa0 between\xa0the\xa0training\xa0provided\xa0by\xa0the\xa0education\xa0system\xa0and\xa0the\xa0country's\xa0needs,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0significant\xa0disparities\xa0across\xa0region,\xa0social?economic\xa0status,\xa0income\xa0 and\xa0gender\xa0in\xa0the\xa0education\xa0sector.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0will\xa0support\xa0improvement\xa0in\xa0the\xa0relevance,\xa0quality\xa0and\xa0performance\xa0of\xa0the\xa0education\xa0and\xa0vocational\xa0training\xa0 systems\xa0to\xa0ensure\xa0better\xa0insertion\xa0and\xa0integration\xa0of\xa0youth\xa0into\xa0the\xa0labor\xa0market.\xa0Promotion\xa0of\xa0productive\xa0employment\xa0and\xa0increased\xa0earnings\xa0capabilities\xa0 should\xa0focus\xa0on\xa0increasing\xa0productivity\xa0in\xa0self?employment\xa0and\xa0micro?enterprises\xa0where\xa0most\xa0of\xa0the\xa0poor\xa0work.\xa0In\xa0its\xa0support,\xa0the\xa0World\xa0Bank\xa0Group\xa0will\xa0 prerequisites\xa0for\xa0sustainable\xa0private\xa0sector?led\xa0growth\xa0in\xa0C\xf4te\xa0d\x92Ivoire,\xa0especially\xa0for\xa0SMEs.\xa0While\xa0building\xa0on\xa0the\xa0existing\xa0work\xa0of\xa0IFC\xa0to\xa0provide\xa0firms\xa0with\xa0 access\xa0to\xa0finance,\xa0the\xa0WBG\xa0will\xa0enhance\xa0its\xa0support\xa0in\xa0response\xa0to\xa0the\xa0identified\xa0SCD\xa0priority\xa0to\xa0reduce\xa0the\xa0financial\xa0access\xa0gap.\xa0The\xa0Government\xa0has\xa0 articulated\xa0a\xa0private\xa0sector?led\xa0growth\xa0strategy\xa0fostering\xa0the\xa0Development\xa0of\xa0industry\xa0and\xa0SMEs\xa0and\xa0improving\xa0access\xa0to\xa0finance,\xa0including\xa0reforms\xa0to\xa0 and\xa0job\xa0creation\xa0\x96\xa0thereby\xa0reducing\xa0poverty\xa0and\xa0promoting\xa0shared\xa0prosperity.\xa0The\xa0CPF\xa0would\xa0support\xa0regulatory\xa0reforms\xa0that\xa0facilitate\xa0business\xa0and\xa0private\xa0
